sub_title: Legal Support Officer| Paralegal| Legal Specialist | Compliance| Master of Laws - LLM, Corporate  Commercial Law | Intellectual Property/European Union Law | Visa available
summary:
I am a Legal Professional from India with a Master of Law (LLM) degree in Commercial Law from the UK, specializing in Company/Corporate Law, Insurance Law, Intellectual Property Law, and Copyright Law related to European Union Law. Currently based in the Netherlands, I hold the position of Legal Support Officer. With a diverse background and experience working on a global scale, including in India, I bring a wide range of knowledge and skills to the table. I have demonstrated strong multicultural leadership abilities through my work with diverse teams in various countries and cultures. I am adept at both operational and strategic levels, and I approach my work with a results-oriented and business-minded mindset.

Wide experience in Legal Management, compliance company management, governance and legal, Recruitment management, and Project management, as well as my demonstrated strengths in team collaboration and individual projects going to root-cause problem-solving in business restructuring & delivering a crystal-clear communication style. 

KEY SKILLS 
Provide the team with Effective Leadership, Guidance, Coaching, Communication, Learning and Development, Project Management,  Negotiation,  Continuous Improvement,  Team Management, Problem Solving,  Decision Making, Attention to Detail, Working under Pressure,  Analytical Thinking, Self-starter, Result-driven, and Result Oriented. 

AREAS OF EXPERTISE 
Legal Matters, Legal Compliance, Legal Document Preparation, Contracts, Due-Diligence governance, Project Management, B2B, Strategic Management, Administration, Resource Management, Recruiting, Hiring, and Onboarding Employees, Relationship Building, Business Education, Client Focus, and Continuous Improvement

LLM  Degree in Commercial Law from Cardiff University(UK)-Company/Corporate law, Intellectual Property law, and Copyright law Open for new Legal officers and Compliance roles in the Netherlands.

school.name: University School of Law and Legal Studies, Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University, New Delhi

profile_positions.description:
Yinner "Connecting people & companies for tomorrow’s work"
We identify what makes people human, capitalize on people's personalities, potential, talent, and attitude. 

✓In charge of the recruitment sourcing process and am constantly able to match the right candidate to 
   the job vacancy requirement via various sourcing channels and ideas. 
✓Collaborate with the hiring manager(s) to ensure a thorough understanding of the desired candidate 
   and to craft the sourcing requirements to help find and entice the best candidates. 
✓Creating and strategizing the company approach- the ultimate goal is to be the starting point for your 
   future fit profile and interview, as well as to make a candidate Dutch labor market fit. 
✓Collaborate with internal HR teams to manage the candidate life cycle, from offer to onboarding, and 
   to keep candidates warm throughout the process.
✓Managing an efficient recruitment process, including sourcing, interview facilitation, and coordination 
   with the hiring manager(s) on the recruitment process;
✓Working with the Hiring Manager(s) and HR Business Partner(s)
✓Creating Job Descriptions to help find the best candidate.
✓Work on developing innovative recruitment strategies and thinking outside the box based on accurate 
   data and costs for candidate sourcing.
✓Perform sourcing activities on LinkedIn and other relevant job boards.
✓Create and manage a database with a talent pool of candidates, both active and passive, for "In 
   demand profiles" available with our customer organization.
✓Review applications and conduct preliminary interviews with selected candidates before presenting 
   suitable candidates to our client's requirements.
✓Involved in both approaching candidates and project management, such as event planning.
✓Review applications and conduct initial interviews with selected candidates, then present those who are 
   a good fit for our client's needs.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
Stryker is one of the world’s leading medical technology companies and, together with its customers, is driven to make healthcare better. The company offers innovative products and services in Orthopaedics, Medical and Surgical, and Neurotechnology and Spine that help improve patient and hospital outcomes.

✓Design & Implement Strategic, Tactical & Operation plans for the rollout of new Medical Device 
    Regulation (MDR) across all products life cycle & EU countries
✓Liaison closely with global core team & EMEA legal councils to drive the project as per timelines
✓Work closely with External consulting provider (Baker & McKenzie) to draft new contracts as per the 
   regulations
✓Responsible for End-2-End implementation of new MDR guidelines, including the update of existing 
   contracts/agreements across EMEA 
✓Work along with the global core team in designing training plans in order to roll out a new regulation 
   smoothly internally in the company
✓Share feedback with legal subgroup team and countries counsel as per their local laws
✓Having weekly calls with the Operating team and sending the weekly meeting agenda within the team 
   and external consultants
✓Implementation of EU MDR shared a legal opinion with numerous groups/stakeholders involved 
   directly/indirectly in Stryker
✓Successfully able to identify important or crucial areas of implementation of EU MDR across Europe
profile_positions.title: Lead Legal Specialist – MDR

profile_positions.description:
Genpact (NYSE: G) is a global professional services firm that makes business transformation real. We drive digital-led innovation and digitally-enabled intelligent operations for our clients, guided by our experience running thousands of processes primarily for Global Fortune 500 companies. 
Growth Path
				Legal Analyst – Financial Services Vertical 
				Legal Analyst – Insurance Vertical (Claims adjudication)

✓Communicating with clients on a regular basis regarding files;
✓Managing customer/client accounts & legal document management
✓Client Relationship Management

✓Putting together disbursements lists for final settlements
